title: What is Trauma Llamas?
content: Trauma Llamas is a collection of 8,888 unique and custom generated llamas living on the Ethereum blockchain.

title: When does the sale go live?
content:
Trauma Llamas main sale is set to go live September 21st at 4pm UTC.

You'll be able to mint 20 Trauma Llamas per transaction in our main sale.

title: Will you have a pre/early sale?
content:
You guys voted on it, so yes! Trauma Llamas public early sale is set to go live September 7th at 4pm UTC.

You'll be able to mint 10 Trauma Llamas per transaction in our early sale.

A select amount of early supporters will get access to our early sale 1 hour earlier by getting whitelisted. Stay connected via Twitter and Discord for more details on how to get whitelisted.

title: How do I purchase a Trauma Llama?
content:
Purchasing a Trauma Llama is very simple.

1. Add the MetaMask extension to your browser.

2. Buy Ethereum (ETH) on an exchange like Coinbase, Binance or FTX and transfer it to your MetaMask wallet.

3. Connect your MetaMask wallet to our website on the minting page.

4. Input the amount of Llamas you wish to purchase (max 20 per transaction), and click Mint Llamas. Approve the pop-up from MetaMask. Once the transaction has been sent, a link to view it on Etherscan will show up shortly after.

title: How much will a Trauma Llama cost?
content: A Trauma Llama will cost 0.04 ETH + gas, and will remain that price throughout the minting period. It will be a fair distribution with no bonding curves, tiers, or reservations.

title: How many possible combinations are there?
content: Trauma Llamas are generated with 132 unique attributes over 9 categories, giving a possibility of 7,541,700,000 different combinations! Each of the 8,888 Trauma Llamas will be unique 1-of-1s.

title: Where are the images stored?
content: All images are hosted through IPFS with additional pinning through Pinata.

title: When will the reveal be?
content: All Trauma Llamas will be revealed shortly after main sale sell out, or after 24 hrs. Whichever is sooner.

title: How many Trauma Llamas are there?
content: There will only ever be 8,888 Trauma Llamas minted in Gen 1. That's the max supply.

title: Will you host any giveaways?
content:
Yes! We'll be minting 125 Trauma Llamas that will be used exclusively for giveaways through our Twitter and Discord.

Make sure you follow us on Twitter and Discord to be entered into any of our upcoming giveaways.

title: What is Trauma Llamas Gen 2?
content: Once the 1st Generation sells out, we will start planning the 2nd Generation. It's worth noting that anyone who holds a Gen 1 Llama, at a certain date revealed in due time, will have advantages whenever Gen 2 becomes available. This includes, but not limited to, early access to minting.
